mapper.sql: order_id, member_id, number, goods_id, createtime, current_status,price,amount, real_amount,sub_amount,rebate,type,address_id,finishtime,ordertime,shop_id

order_id, (select name from member where member_id = member )as member_id, number, (select goods_name from goods where goods.goods_id = goods_order.goods_id )goods_id, createtime, current_status,price,amount,real_amount,sub_amount,rebate,type, (select concat(sheng,shi,qu,address_detail)as address_id from address where address.address_id = goods_order.address_id) as address_id,finishtime,ordertime,shop_id

update goods_order
member_id = #{member_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
number = #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER},
goods_id = #{goods_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
current_status = #{current_status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price = #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
real_amount = #{real_amount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
sub_amount = #{sub_amount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
rebate = #{rebate,jdbcType=DOUBLE},

finishtime = #{finishtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ordertime = #{ordertime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
shop_id = #{shop_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where order_id = #{order_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update goods_order set member_id = #{member_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, number = #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goods_id = #{goods_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, current_status = #{current_status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, real_amount = #{real_amount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, sub_amount = #{sub_amount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, rebate = #{rebate,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address_id = #{address_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ordertime = #{ordertime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, finishtime = #{finishtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where order_id = #{order_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
